series_description: This series documents aircraft accidents that includes the aircraft description, location, type of flying weather, property damage, investigation date, description of action taken, and Virginia airmen's information. This series may include, but is limited to: reports.

This series documents the specifications, owners, location, inactivity, registration numbers, insurance, permits, and fleet and dealer reports for all aircraft operating in the commonwealth. This series may included, but is not limited to: reports.

This series documents the receipt of and response to inquiries concerning aviation licensing, safety, and educational as well as policy/procedures enacted by the division. This may include, but is not limited to: correspondence.
This series documents owner registrations and licensing of aircrafts based in the State of Virginia. This series may but is not limited to: applications.

This series documents information on each airport operated maintained in the Commonwealth. This series may include, but is not limited to: photographs, architectural plans and reports, and correspondence.
This series documents licensing of airport facilities. This may include, but is not limited to applications, approval or letters, and correspondence.

This series documents sets of drawings used for airport project development such as, but not limited to:pavement reconstruction, security fencing, and obstruction removal. This series may include, but is not limited to:plans, drawings and specifications
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents details about aircrafts stored at an airport that is used to justify development and/or expansion of airport hangars or aprons. This series may include, but is not limited to: survey forms.

This series documents the permitting of aircraft operators (individuals, partnerships, or corporations) to carry passengers or freight by hire. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, permits, and insurance policy documentation.

This series documents sets of drawings of airports and airport facilities throughout Virginia that are used to prioritize future development and funding. This series may include, but is not limited to: airport layout and master plans.
This series documents Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) inspections. This series may include, but is not limited to: Form 5010 and correspondence.
This series documents the flights made by agency aircraft, including signed flight authorization by cabinet secretaries. series may include, but is not limited to: forms and logs.

This series documents a young person's participation and submission of artwork in the International Aviation Art contest. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, requisition forms, photographs of artwork, newspaper articles, and original artwork.
Documents and Leases This series consists of legal documents and leases pertaining the operation of airports and airfields throughout Virginia.

This series documents the commissioning of certain airports part of the federal Navigational Aid System (NAVAIDS) program. This series may include, but is not limited to: Flight Check Report, Ground Inspection Report, and NAVAID license issued by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC).

This series documents operations of certain airports in the federal NAVAIDS program. This series may include, but is not limited to: Federal Aviation Administration(FAA) annual inspections, and documentation of NAVAIDS repairs.
This series documents conditions of all runways and airport areas, and any maintenance carried out on paved areas in and around airports. This series may include, but is not limited to: books.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents photographic surveys of airports and facilities that reveal any obstructions and natural or man-made growth near the facilities. This series may include, but is not limited to: photos and reports.

series_title: Program and Contest Participant Master Lists
series_description: This series documents a master list of participants and of various programs and contests including the International Aviation Art Contest, Student and Teacher Scholarship Programs, Aviation Awards, and the Aviation Ambassadors Program. This series may include, but is not limited to master lists.

This series documents administration of scholarship programs by the agency including Plenti and Lillard scholarships. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, students essays, judging forms, photos, cover letters, notification and transcripts.
This series documents the submission of annual reports by each airport identifying proposed projects and cost estimations for the next six years. This series may include, but is not to: reports.
retention_statement: 6 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the administration of various special programs that the agency sponsors or in which it is a including, but not limited, to the Hershey Conference, Ambassadors Program, and Promoting Your Airport in Changing Times Program. This series may include, but is not limited to: brochures, packets, calendars, lists, and schedules.
This series documents detailed plans of an airport terminal building that is used to determine funding eligibility. This series may include, but is not limited to: plans.
